name: Super Star Trek
summary: A 'Star Trek' variant originally written by Bob Leedom in BASIC for the Data General Nova minicomputer, adding many new features that would be included in most port from then on, including moving enemy ships, navigation, and an expanded 64x64 grid space. This version later became well known when the code was found and published by David Ahl in his 1978 edition of 'BASIC Computer Games'.
